title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
The Number of hours watched is highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
The Number of hours watched is highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours watched for 10 number of Gamess.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
Second maximum Number of hours watched is found at Games Fortnite.
The difference of Number of hours watched between the highest and lowest Games is 393.8.
Number of hours watched at Games League of Legends is 512.3 , second place is Fortnite at 465.0, and thirdly is Just Chatting at 372.5.
The highest value 512.3 at League of Legends is almost 1.98 times larger than the average value 258.19.
